original_text: The space also before the little chambers was one cubit on this side, and the space was one cubit on that side: and the little chambers were six cubits on this side, and six cubits on that side.
korean_text: 방 앞에 간막이 벽이 있는데 이쪽 간막이 벽도 한 척이요 저쪽 간막이 벽도 한 척이며 그 방은 이쪽도 여섯 척이요 저쪽도 여섯 척이며

sentences.original_text: The space also before the little chambers was one cubit on this side
sentences.korean_translation: 작은 방 앞의 공간도 이쪽으로 한 규빗이었고

sentences.original_text: and the space was one cubit on that side
and the little chambers were six cubits on this side
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 작은 방들은 이쪽으로 여섯 규빗이었고

sentences.original_text: and six cubits on that side
